scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a single male figure, likely a prophet or a king, wearing an elaborate turban and ornate robes. He has a long beard and is looking upwards and to the right. His right hand is raised, holding a folded piece of fabric or parchment, with his index finger extended as if making a point or delivering a prophecy. His left hand is also visible, pointing downwards. The background is sparsely decorated with small circles, suggesting a celestial or abstract setting.
